name: IndiMedicos
overview:
IndiMedicos online community for indian doctors, where one can exchange medical insights with colleagues spanning more than 30 specialties.

IndiMedicos’ network of physicians can be contacted for collecting feedback about drugs, diseases and various other types of content. For example, Govt. agencies can get the relevant data for number of tuberculosis patients in India or specific zone in India.

The site itself is free of cost for doctors. It also offers an opportunity for doctors to earn monetary benefits via participation in various researches online.

IndiMedicos.com extends itself as an online platform for Hospitals to brand themselves, and market various opportunities including Jobs, Training Programs and other events.

Pharmaceutical companies can avail membership and post drug related queries to the Physicians for online feedback. Interested Physicians would participate in the research online and earn possible monetary benefits. The feedback is aggregated, analyzed and presented in various online reports via different online tools, to the Pharmaceutical segments.
